attributes.action: Allow dogs in Brookmill Park in Lewisham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm a resident of the area close to Brookmill Park and I don't understand why such a nice and well kept park is restricted to dogs.
I understand that since the park has a children play area and a cycle path, the Council wants to avoid incidents, but the same features are present in many other parks where dogs are allowed.
The park is not attended by many people daily, and is equipped with bins for the disposal of dogs waste.  I ask fort the restriction to be removed or modified in order to allow dogs on a lead to be welcome.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
